import React, { useContext, useState } from "react"; import { NewAppContext } from "../../App"; import "./DashboardHome.css"; const DashboardHome = () => { const { depositInfo, setDepositInfo } = useContext(NewAppContext); const [depositAmount, setDepositAmount] = useState(); // calculate deposit amount // console.log(depositInfo); const depositAmountArray = []; depositInfo?.map((data) => depositAmountArray.push(data?.depositAmount)); if (depositAmount) { const totalDeposit = depositAmountArray?.reduce( (prev, curr) => parseFloat(prev) + parseFloat(curr) ); setDepositAmount(totalDeposit); } console.log("depoamount", depositAmount); return (

Current Balance

{depositAmount}

{/* card 2 */}

Deposit Balance

{depositAmount}

{/* card 3 */}

Withdrawal Balance

8,282

); }; export default DashboardHome;
